tool.name: Association using MLM
tool.command: mkdir -p $__tool_directory__/out/ && perl $__tool_directory__/run_pipeline.pl -fork1 #if str($geno_type.geno_source) == "hapmap" -h '$hapmapGeno' #else if str($geno_type.geno_source) == "vcf" -vcf '$vcfGeno' #else if str($geno_type.geno_source) == "plink" -plink -ped '$plinkPed' -map '$plinkMap' # else if str($geno_type.geno_source) == "flajack" -flapjack -geno '$flapjackGeno' -map '$flapjackMap' #end if -filterAlign -filterAlignMinFreq '$alleleFreq' -fork2 -r '$traitFile' -fork3 -r '$popStructure' -fork4 -k '$kinshipFile' -combine5 -input1 -input2 -input3 -intersect -combine6 -input5 -input4 -mlm -mlmVarCompEst P3D -mlmCompressionLevel Optimum -export $__tool_directory__/out/output -runfork1 -runfork2 -runfork3 -runfork4 && mv $__tool_directory__/out/output3.txt $mlm_output1 && mv $__tool_directory__/out/output4.txt $mlm_output2 && mv $__tool_directory__/out/output5.txt $mlm_output3 && mv $__tool_directory__/out/output6.txt $mlm_output4 && rm -r $__tool_directory__/out/
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**Association using MLM**
-----
**What this tool does**
This tool runs Mixed Linear Model(MLM) using TASSEL for genotype-phenotype association analysis. This is very similar to Association using GLM with the addition of kinship matrix generated from running first the Kinship Analysis on the genotype matrix.
-----
**Input**
**Genotype Data**: This tool takes genotype data in Hapmap, VCF, Flapjack(.geno, .map) or Plink(.ped, .map) file format.
